CmdLine: apt-get update && 	apt-get install -y curl libmono-cil-dev && 	jack_tag=$(curl -sX GET "https://api.github.com/repos/Jackett/Jackett/releases/latest" | awk '/tag_name/{print $4;exit}' FS='[""]') && 	curl -o /tmp/jacket.tar.gz -L https://github.com/Jackett/Jackett/releases/download/$jack_tag/Jackett.Binaries.Mono.tar.gz && 	mkdir -p /opt/jackett && 	tar xf /tmp/jacket.tar.gz -C /opt/jackett --strip-components=1 && 	apt-get clean && 	rm -rf /tmp/* /var/lib/apt/lists/* /var/tmp/* && 	useradd -u 15000 -U -s /bin/false jackett
Commands.Name: run
